name: v0.13.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_webpack",
    sha256 = "21a85849d01eebbd0cb0a5c0120eb58e4d3275eda68565918e7c0d84e14d30d9",
    strip_prefix = "rules_webpack-0.13.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/download/v0.13.0/rules_webpack-v0.13.0.tar.gz",
)

#######################
# rules_webpack setup #
#######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_webpack//webpack:dependencies.bzl", "rules_webpack_dependencies")

rules_webpack_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* ci: enable buildifier check on ci by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/115
* chore: bump rules_js dep to 1.29.2 to pickup Windows fix by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/116
* chore: bzlmod by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/113


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/compare/v0.12.0...v0.13.0

## What's Changed
* chore: update dependencies by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/111
* feat: add configure_mode & configure_devtool attributes to webpack_bundle and webpack_devserver by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/112


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/compare/v0.11.0...v0.12.0

name: v0.11.0
body:
⚠️ BREAKING CHANGES ⚠️

`webpack_repositories` repository rule is removed and a new `node_modules` attribute is now required for both `webpack_bundle` and `webpack_devserver`. This change is BREAKING for all users.

After debugging errors with complex webpack configurations with clients we found that fetching webpack in `webpack_repositories` and linking into a `node_modules` tree within an external Bazel repository can lead to unexpected errors with some webpack plugins that don't expect webpack to be found in multiple `node_modules` trees. To fix this problem in the simplest and most general way, this release removes `webpack_repositories` and now expects users to provide the target to their own `node_modules` trees that must include the `webpack`, `webpack-cli` and, for the `webpack_devserver` rule, also the `webpack-dev-server` npm packages.

The `//path/to:node_modules` tree target must be passed to the `webpack_bundle` and `webpack_devserver` rules via the `node_modules` attribute. For example,

```
webpack_bundle(
    name = "bundle",
    node_modules = "//:node_modules",
    ...
)
```

This change has the added benefits of not requiring users to keep the webpack version used in their `package.json` in sync with their WORKSPACE and not requiring any changes to `rules_webpack` to support new releases of webpack.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_webpack",
    sha256 = "2841761bdf7e82f05a00c388e97c7b81dd47b55a30c5bf4109e96aad041352cf",
    strip_prefix = "rules_webpack-0.11.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/download/v0.11.0/rules_webpack-v0.11.0.tar.gz",
)

#######################
# rules_webpack setup #
#######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_webpack//webpack:dependencies.bzl", "rules_webpack_dependencies")

rules_webpack_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update deps by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/109
* refactor: remove vendored webpack versions, user must provider their own webpack tool from their node_modules by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/110


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/compare/v0.10.1...v0.11.0

name: v0.10.1
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_webpack",
    sha256 = "82547fe69e477623dd8a2a50f809e3c89f2035d6b6236d0596d69b7e81c68676",
    strip_prefix = "rules_webpack-0.10.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/download/v0.10.1/rules_webpack-v0.10.1.tar.gz",
)

#######################
# rules_webpack setup #
#######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_webpack//webpack:dependencies.bzl", "rules_webpack_dependencies")

rules_webpack_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Fetch and register the webpack tool
load("@aspect_rules_webpack//webpack:repositories.bzl", "webpack_repositories")

webpack_repositories(name = "webpack")

load("@webpack//:npm_repositories.bzl", webpack_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

webpack_npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: make entry_points optional if output_dir is True by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/107


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.1

name: v0.10.0
body:
⚠️ This release has **BREAKING CHANGES** in the `webpack_bundle` API. See https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/105 for more details.

WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_webpack",
    sha256 = "dc64191f6c9096122f70ed5ab4af1a922b6aef9fc1cdeb99eb64f8283b31f6ea",
    strip_prefix = "rules_webpack-0.10.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/download/v0.10.0/rules_webpack-v0.10.0.tar.gz",
)

#######################
# rules_webpack setup #
#######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_webpack//webpack:dependencies.bzl", "rules_webpack_dependencies")

rules_webpack_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Fetch and register the webpack tool
load("@aspect_rules_webpack//webpack:repositories.bzl", "webpack_repositories")

webpack_repositories(name = "webpack")

load("@webpack//:npm_repositories.bzl", webpack_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

webpack_npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.27.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/102
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.0-rc0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/104
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/106
* feat: align webpack bundle and devserver APIs by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/105


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/compare/v0.9.1...v0.10.0

## What's Changed
* fix: multi-entry bundle with environment variables by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/92
* chore: Add the macOS runner to the matrix strategy by @realtimetodie in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/89
* chore: update to rules_js 1.19.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/95
* chore: support webpack v5.69.1 by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/96
* fix: fix webpack v5.73.0 version by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/97
* release: publish release artifact by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/93

## New Contributors
* @realtimetodie made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/89

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

## What's Changed
* fix(bundle): don't request typechecking to build a bundle by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/78

* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.8.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/79
* chore: use Aspect CLI 5.0.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/80
* chore: update to Bazel 6.0.0 and Aspect CLI 5.1.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/81
* chore: update to aspect_rules_js 1.13.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/82

```starlark
    strip_prefix = "rules_webpack-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/archive/refs/tags/v0.6.0.tar.gz",
)

#######################
# rules_webpack setup #
#######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_webpack//webpack:dependencies.bzl", "rules_webpack_dependencies")

rules_webpack_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Fetch and register the webpack tool
load("@aspect_rules_webpack//webpack:repositories.bzl", "webpack_repositories")

webpack_repositories(name = "webpack")

load("@webpack//:npm_repositories.bzl", webpack_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

webpack_npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to bazel 6.0.0rc2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/71
* fix: add missing inputs from js providers to webpack bundle action; fixes #57 by @stoiky in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/68
* fix: use name param passed to webpack_devserver macro by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/72
* feat: add env attribute to webpack_bundle by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/73

## New Contributors
* @stoiky made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/68

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/compare/v0.5.3...v0.6.0

## What's Changed
* chore: update to rules_js 1.1.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/47
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/46
* chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/22
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/24
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_nodejs to v5.5.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/48
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/49
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.11.8 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/50
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/51
* chore: update to  aspect_bazel_lib 1.12.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/56
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_rules_js to v1.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/53
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_nodejs to v5.6.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/54
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/55
* refactor: update webpack_devserver to use js_run_devserver under the hood by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/58
* feat: support rules_js 1.6.5 with improved version mirroring by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/59


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_webpack",
    sha256 = "ec88e0c330661ed935534229c5e8480cb7ab281da4eca1b9b0b133374a724e66",
    strip_prefix = "rules_webpack-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/archive/refs/tags/v0.4.0.tar.gz",
)

#######################
# rules_webpack setup #
#######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_webpack//webpack:dependencies.bzl", "rules_webpack_dependencies")

rules_webpack_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Fetch and register the webpack tool
load("@aspect_rules_webpack//webpack:repositories.bzl", "webpack_register_toolchains", "LATEST_VERSION")

webpack_register_toolchains(
    name = "webpack",
    webpack_version = LATEST_VERSION
)
```

[rules_js 1.1.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v1.1.0) is required for this release.

## What's Changed
* fix: use consistent npm_import namespace for vendored npm dependencies of rules_webpack by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/35
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/39
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.34.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/40
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_nodejs to v5.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/37
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/36
* fix: remove extension constraint on webpack_config by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/41
* chore: update to rules_js 1.0.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/42
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/21
* docs: remove experimental warning by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/45
* chore: update to rules_js 1.1.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/44

## New Contributors
* @jbedard made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/45

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

## What's Changed
* chore: initial work for moving code from rules_nodejs by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/2
* chore: remove forgotten dependency by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/3
* feat: implement entry_points and output_dir by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/4
* webpack_dev_server rule for use with ibazel by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/5
* Docs by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/6
* Enhanced documentation for webpack rules by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/7
* fix: do not suspend watcher while there is another compilation running by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/9
* Fix race conditions with webpack_dev_server by @mrmeku in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/8
* build: fix ci build caching by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/11
* refactor: do not use watch mode for worker mode by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/15
* refactor: layer it on top of rules_js by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/17
* chore: update to rules_js 0.13.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/18
* Fix links in the readme by @dymart in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/19
* Configure Renovate by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/20
* fix(devserver): jest -> webpack naming by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/26
* fix(devserver): use the devserver config directly rather than copying to bin by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/25

## New Contributors
* @thesayyn made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/2
* @mrmeku made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/5
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/6
* @kormide made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/11
* @gregmagolan made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/18
* @dymart made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/19
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/20
* @mattem made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/pull/26

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/commits/v0.1.0
